title: v1.0.0
items: Added a failsafe trigger for running out of materials. When the failsafe is triggered, the bot will exit to lobby and auto-login will disable.

title: v1.0.0
items: Improved overall responsiveness when handling disturbances

title: v1.0.0
items: Fixed the placement of Reagent III glyphs
Fixed an issue that was preventing the bot from cycling between Foundational and Alteration glyphs in the Glyph menu

title: v1.0.0
items: Increased reliability of capturing shambling horror

title: v1.0.0
items: Bot will now ensure candles are placed before starting a ritual
